description: 'Rangers hope to sign Celtic's exiting Greg Taylor' - gossip
title: 'Rangers hope to sign Celtic's exiting Greg Taylor'
title_page: 'Rangers hope to sign Celtic's exiting Greg Taylor' - gossip - BBC Sport
maintext:
Rangers hope to persuade Greg Taylor to switch from Celtic this summer, but with Dinamo Zagreb, who failed in a January bid, still keen and Major League Soccer clubs also interested, the 27-year-old Scotland left-back will assess all other options before even considering such a controversial move. (Football Insider), external
Former Rangers centre-half Graham Roberts has revealed that he urged the Ibrox club to sign Dele Alli before the England midfielder landed his Â£5m move to Tottenham Hotspur from MK Dons 10 years ago. (Express), external
Rangers ultras supporters group the Union Bears have announced plans for a "Copland Stairs Street Party" ahead of Thursday's Europa League match against Athletic Bilbao to "bring the noise and colour" to the fixture. (The Herald), external
